# Context

This section aims to explain in detail what the function `hectimetables::dummy_creation()` does and how it should be used for future developers who would like to get inspired for their own projects. 

# Parameters

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ptds2021/project--G2")

library("hectimetables")

hectimetables::dummy_creation()
```
